citations.doc: README_backup.md — Configuration table row for `retryCount` (original): "Number of retry attempts. Range: **0–10**, default is **1**"
citations.code: input.ts lines 5-7, 16-19 — JSDoc and runtime checks: JSDoc says 'Must be between 1 and 5. Default is 3.'; code sets default to 3 and throws if retryCount < 1 || retryCount > 5.

details.fix_summary: Updated README.md to document `retryCount` range 1–5 and default 3; added example and note that out-of-range values throw an error.
